title: The Marionette mystery
creator_credit: William Cameron Menzies and Telepak Films
brief_description: Regis Toomey introduces this murder mystery and the various clues, then each of the players act out the events. Starring: Regis Toomey, Janet Scott, Gloria Holden, and John Hoyt.
